review: The set-up was very easy.  All my favorite Amazon Prime shows are at my fingertips.  Time for another Veronica Mars marathon!!!!!  Watch all 3 seasons and then the movie.  Life is good!!!
author: Chelsie C. "Chelsie"

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick stands out in the midst of its competitors in terms of functionality, and price.  I have both Apple TV and Google Chromecast and I prefer the Fire TV Stick any day.  The Fire TV Stick is more user friendly, offering a better interface and menu than Chromecast and Apple TV.  With its impressive content offerings such as HBO GO, Showtime Anytime, Disney, streaming staples Netflix and Hulu Plus, and all of Amazon Prime media content, this tiny usb drive transforms any tv into a multimedia experience.  Overall, one of Amazon’s best products, and an absolute must have for Prime Members.
author: Anne M. Donohue

review: prime and nonprime shows in same listings - and the movies I want to watch/series seem to all be not prime so there for additional cost (full series harry potter, full series twilight etc etc)  otherwise, this works like a charm and I LOVE it
